amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for renewable energy programs by $30 million with offsets from the Yucca Mountain Repository account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for renewable energy programs by $30,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (CO) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 251 (Roll no. 392).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Udall (CO).
